for loop:-

	public class forloopdemo {

		public static void main(String[] args) {
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i;
		for (i=1 ;i<=10; i++)
	{
	
		System.out.println("3" +"" +"*" +i +"= " +i*3);
	}
	
		}

	}
 output:-	3*1= 3
		3*2= 6
		3*3= 9
		3*4= 12
		3*5= 15
		3*6= 18
		3*7= 21
		3*8= 24
		3*9= 27
		3*10= 30
------------------------------------------------------------------
